apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

address.description: Address is the IP address or DNS name of the remote machine.

commandsAsScript.description:
CommandsAsScript indicates if the commands should be executed as a script.
If true, the commands will be written to a file and executed as a script.
If false, the commands will be executed one by one.

customCleanUpCommands.description: CustomCleanUpCommands allow the user to run custom command for the clean up process of the machine.

port.description: Port is the SSH port of the remote machine.

sshKeyRef.description:
SSHKeyRef is a reference to a secret that contains the SSH private key.
The key must be placed on the secret using the key "value".

name.description: Name is the name of the secret.

user.description: User is the user to use when connecting to the remote machine.

workingDir.description: WorkingDir is the directory to use as working directory when connecting to the remote machine.
